name: Slimy Tank
description:
Submission for GameDev Caffe Gamejam 2023

A casual endless runner game, you're playing as a tank and kill as many slimes as you can except...

Assets used in this game:

1. Tank

2. Background (In Game)

3. Background (Main menu)

4. Slime

5. Font

Audio List:

1. Engine Sound by Ralingsa (Reuse from previous game jam lol)

2. Player Damaged Sound by  Ralingsa  (Also a reuse from previous game jam)

3. Fire Sound

4. Dead Sound

5. Enemy Hit Sound
